channel.title: Vietnamese on Vegan Recipe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Vietnamese on Vegan Recipe Blog

item.title: Easy Vegan Pho
item.description: Ingredients Broth Vegetable broth (8 cups) Water (2-3 cups) 1 yellow onion 4-6 garlic cloves 1 thumb length ginger Garam masala Turmeric Soy sauce Chili oil Food items Sesame Oil Wide rice noodles Shiitake mushrooms Tofu Garnishes Bean sprouts Thai red chili peppers Thai basil Green onion Directions The Broth Sautee the onion and garlic on medium-high heat for about 5 minutes. Add vegetable broth and water.
